title: Returns
meta_description: Buy with confidence, PartSelect offers a 365-day money back guarantee on all parts. Learn about our return policy, and how to complete your return online!
section_headings: Parts must be in resaleable condition to qualify:

On April 3, EasyApplianceParts merged with our long-time sister site, PartSelect

At PartSelect, we want every do-it-yourselfer to feel confident choosing OEM parts and tackling repairs. We also know that sometimes a part just doesn't work out. 
    That's why we offer a 365-day return period for your peace of mind with every order. And if you do need to make a return, our simple self-service system lets you handle it online in just a few clicks.
Fill out a quick online return form and you'll soon receive an email response to guide you through the next steps.
Pack your parts securely in a box. Need to return more than one part? Pack them together and we'll take care of them at once!
Drop your package off with the carrier we've listed in your return instructions. As soon as we get it and verify it, your refund will be on its way in 7-10 business days.
Please be sure your return meets the following conditions:
All brand logos are trademarks of their respective owners.
The PartSelect logo is a Registered Trademark of Atlantic Laundry Centres, Ltd.

We'll match a lower price on genuine manufacturer parts from qualifying online competitors within 14 days of your purchase. The item must be identical, in stock, and from an eligible retailer. Excludes coupons, marketplaces, non-OEM parts, and used/refurbished items.  Learn More.

full_content:
Returns
At PartSelect, we want every do-it-yourselfer to feel confident choosing OEM parts and tackling repairs. We also know that sometimes a part just doesn't work out. 
    That's why we offer a 365-day return period for your peace of mind with every order. And if you do need to make a return, our simple self-service system lets you handle it online in just a few clicks.
1. Start your return
Fill out a quick online return form and you'll soon receive an email response to guide you through the next steps.
Start a Return
2. Pack it up
Pack your parts securely in a box. Need to return more than one part? Pack them together and we'll take care of them at once!
3. Send it back
Drop your package off with the carrier we've listed in your return instructions. As soon as we get it and verify it, your refund will be on its way in 7-10 business days.
Start a Return
Terms & Conditions
Please be sure your return meets the following conditions:
Parts must be in resaleable condition to qualify:
“Resaleable” means that the part must not have incurred damage, such as signs of installation by the customer, marks, or scuffing.
Part must also be in its original packaging to be considered resaleable. Please inspect part before removing from its packaging, as this can cause return to be rejected.
Electrical parts are subject to additional scrutiny.
Rejected returns cannot be shipped back to customers.
Returning Parts to PartSelect:
Please have your model number and serial number ready when contacting our customer service to begin the return process.
After contacting us, you will receive an email with return shipping details (remember to check your junk mail).
Returns must be received within
365 days
of the date the items were originally shipped.
Customers are responsible for the cost of return shipping.
If the return is a result of our error, or the part was lost in shipping, contact us within 10 business days to arrange a refund.
        In this case, we will refund the original cost of shipping after your return has been processed, and provide you with a pre-paid shipping label if we would like the part returned to us.
        Additional information such as photos of the part may be required to complete a return of this nature.
Receiving Your Refund:
Please allow 7-10 business days after your return has been successfully processed for your refund to appear.
If your refund is taking longer than expected, or you would like to check its status, please contact our customer service desk for an update on your return.
Find Your Part
SEARCH
Need help finding your model number?
Search your model number to find:
Genuine OEM parts guaranteed to fit
Free manuals and guides
Repair instructions and videos

title: One-Year Warranty
meta_description: PartSelect offers one-year warranty on appliance parts. Same day shipping and no-hassle returns available.
paragraphs: Hello!
You're visiting the PartSelect site in U.S.
Would you like to shop on the Canadian site?

Model numbers can be made up of numbers (1005400, for example) or a combination of letters and numbers (LAT1000AAE). The model number will most likely appear on either a paper sticker or a metal plate. Your appliance's model number tag may look similar to the sample model number tags shown here (model number highlighted in yellow):
On April 3, EasyApplianceParts merged with our long-time sister site, PartSelect

Every appliance part found on our site is authentic and made to the same standards as the original part.
        In fact, all our parts come directly from the manufacturer and are certified to be original.
        That means the parts you see when you search our site using your model number are guaranteed to work with your appliance or electronic.

We’re so confident in the quality of parts we sell that we back each appliance and electronic part with a one-year warranty (some conditions apply, see more details.)
        If a part you order from PartSelect fails or breaks down in the first year, you can send the part back and receive a free replacement part.
All brand logos are trademarks of their respective owners.
The PartSelect logo is a Registered Trademark of Atlantic Laundry Centres, Ltd.

We'll match a lower price on genuine manufacturer parts from qualifying online competitors within 14 days of your purchase. The item must be identical, in stock, and from an eligible retailer. Excludes coupons, marketplaces, non-OEM parts, and used/refurbished items.  Learn More.

full_content:
One-Year Warranty
Every appliance part found on our site is authentic and made to the same standards as the original part.
        In fact, all our parts come directly from the manufacturer and are certified to be original.
        That means the parts you see when you search our site using your model number are guaranteed to work with your appliance or electronic.
We’re so confident in the quality of parts we sell that we back each appliance and electronic part with a one-year warranty (some conditions apply, see more details.)
        If a part you order from PartSelect fails or breaks down in the first year, you can send the part back and receive a free replacement part.
One-Year Warranty
Warranty does not cover normal wear and tear or parts such as water filters.
Customer is responsible for paying shipping and handling for replacement part.
Customer may be required to provide model number and serial number of appliance to qualify for warranty.

title: Fast Shipping
meta_description: PartSelect offers fast shipping on all in-stock appliance parts. Order before 4pm EST and your part will ship the same day!
paragraphs: Hello!
You're visiting the PartSelect site in U.S.
Would you like to shop on the Canadian site?

Model numbers can be made up of numbers (1005400, for example) or a combination of letters and numbers (LAT1000AAE). The model number will most likely appear on either a paper sticker or a metal plate. Your appliance's model number tag may look similar to the sample model number tags shown here (model number highlighted in yellow):
On April 3, EasyApplianceParts merged with our long-time sister site, PartSelect
When something needs fixing, we know you need your quality repair parts fast without any hassles. That's why we prioritize fast shipping from our network of warehouses across the US.

Depending on the time of day you place your order, many parts will leave our warehouses on the same day, and the average time it takes to deliver parts using our Standard shipping method is just 
        1.8 business days. In fact, 95% of our customers receive their in-stock parts within 2 day.

We also have EconoShip options for those who can afford to wait a little longer to spend less on shipping, and Next Business Day shipping on in-stock items for when the repair simply cannot wait. Whatever your needs, our fast shipping options will have you and your repair covered.
Fast Service
"PartSelect had the right part while others did not. It was shipped SUPER fast at a reasonable price. It was well packaged and arrived in excellent condition! Couldn’t have been happier!"
"Received my replacement part in about two days… great service!"
Fast delivery. Perfect fit. Good price
"Ordered a fridge door hinge. Showed up in 2 days and slid right in. Great service."
All brand logos are trademarks of their respective owners.
The PartSelect logo is a Registered Trademark of Atlantic Laundry Centres, Ltd.

We'll match a lower price on genuine manufacturer parts from qualifying online competitors within 14 days of your purchase. The item must be identical, in stock, and from an eligible retailer. Excludes coupons, marketplaces, non-OEM parts, and used/refurbished items.  Learn More.
